bow: stop apologizing for your baby is anyone else sick and tired of moms giving out goody bags to apologize for their babies on airplanes or is it just me who realizes that literally everyone was once baby and needs to get over it if another baby is crying on plane just said to my partner yesterday that annoyed when people always uses the teething excuse for anything less than perfect behavior your kid is baby toddler it okay that in itself is good enough reason for them to be crying and acting up don tell me your kid has been teething for months right while think the goodie bags are cute idea there should not be societal trend towards feeling obligated to apologize or offer presents to strangers for your child existence just one more thing in mountain of other things that new parents already have to do agree so much with this have witnessed crying babies in planes and never have thought anything bad about parents even before had my kid and understood how unpredictable they can be it surprises me when adults are happy to receive candy because random child is crying on plane it part of life and price of living in society 🤷🏻‍♀️ things happen try not to apologize for my kid but sometimes quick sorry excuse the kid is helpful also on similar lines don use my kid as an excuse for getting late opting out of things if that not the genuine reason yeah but on the flip side also need people to stop going out of their way to praise me for having good baby it sets precedent for behavior that based entirely on luck it not fair that have good baby and the other woman on the flight doesn it not fair that my baby was good baby today and therefore was approved as mother and now need to make sure that how my kid acts all the time have absolutely no issues with babies crying it their only way of communicating hope that most of the population realizes this too unfortunately there always those cranky people who do care agree 100 it especially ridiculous and setting unrealistic expectations when you make them for 400 co passengers on the other hand have several single friends who regularly post about having had terrible flight experience because of crying baby to them say you ll only know when you have one of your own what like to see more often is adults handing out goodie bags on flights because they re way more likely to be rude loud and obnoxious on purpose speaking from having experience taking several 16 24 hour flights in the last few years yes up until this year was flying at least dozen times year and the only times can recall where have been bothered it has been because of other adult passengers strangely enough good mothering seems to be inextricably linked to prioritizing the comfort of strangers yeah hard pass from me do have time or energy for writing thank you cards to people am actually grateful for let alone hundreds of bribe bags to complete strangers how about note to passengers that says hey if you hear my baby crying just remember probably having worse time than you here piece of candy anyway agreeeed we re traveling in july and will be taking flights with our then 11 month old hoping for the best but definitely not making goody bags on top everything else that needs to be planned can confirm have good baby kinda feel like that label is setting us up to fail thank you removed ha if anything people should be giving us candy because we have to deal with the crying kid and feel the eyes of 100 passengers judging us the candy is whatever but do think the ear plugs are cool on flight would appreciate it if got pair from parent and they ended up being helpful it nice thing but would expect it also crying baby can ruin flight it does matter if it my baby or another while it fact do blame the baby for it it just that listening to something scream for hours is killer on your nerves you are bad parent it just an aspect of having baby my only expectation of parents is to do your best to minimize the inconvenience you or your children put on strangers it does mean stop living as part of society we all have to listen to children or babies cry or throw fits at the store or in an airplane do have to listen to it during movie think the biggest problem is unreasonable people do understand the lines well and they are most goal it not reasonable to let your child scream during showing of deadpool it not reasonable to be mad at parents that babies are crying on flight those are vastly different circumstances but minority of folks treat them equally do think most of us are reasonable folks yes crying baby ruined flight it fact so did getting stuck in the middle coach seat between two college linebackers it not anyone fault it just crappy situation that happens right like awesome you re seeing him on an easy day you missed the chaos post holidays of trying to get back on routine or when he is sock come by then mentioned this on one of the posts on pics think where someone posted picture of goodie bag and apology note it very nice thing to do but unnecessary in my opinion babies exist in the world and they cry if you don like it that your problem got torn to shreds over that thinking going to say no ftm to 4m and next month we ll be flying with him there are lot of things just did really get before becoming mom but my feelings on this have changed people are typically travelling for work or for pleasure and being seated next to crying baby is conducive to either empathize with them and plan to offer ear plugs did long flight with my daughter at that age it nerve wracking and she wasn perfect but it temporary situation also had so much support from people around me the couple behind me told me that anyone who is grumpy hasn had kids and anyone who has had kids understands that it tough 🤷‍♀️ bonus on that vacation we went on hike and ended up in the dark hiking across dunes to the car and my daughter was hungry and tired and screaming most of the way there was couple about our age but without kids who stopped to make sure we had light source and just generally looked out for us we got back to our cars at about the same time and apologized for the crying interrupting their hike and without skipping beat the husband replied not at all babies are blessings have great night that stuck with me think as parents you re 100 more likely to be more bothered by your child crying than people around you except for people who suck when took my on plane he either slept or quietly played on my lap he happy baby in general though however it was large plane and there were at least three other babies on the plane under the age of and several other children think one baby cried for short time but it did really bother most people because planes are loud already ear plugs are going to do much if you re seated next to screaming baby anyways its still going to be annoying to person who gets annoyed by those kinds of things but if that is what you what to spend your money and effort on go ahead serious question do you not bring your own headphones for flight thought that was common practice between my music or an audiobook and the loud airplane noise do hear most things that are going on have had good flights and bad ones and on the good ones there always someone who comes up and whispers that other baby was way louder than your baby or something like that thinking they re paying me huge compliment ve been that other mom usually that other mom so do super appreciate it respond with something like we got lucky today same usually say something like all babies are good babies it just hard for them to do all of these things some days duck yes hahaha love your username god it annoys me to no end when people ask me why is he crying hell if know he 19 months old 🤷🏻‍♀️ maybe it teething or maybe it that he hungry he tired he not getting his way or the fact that he asked for milk and gave him milk 🤦🏻‍♀️ toddlers are just emotional like that this resonates with how dinner went for us last night at an upscale place we were purposely seated in the kid corner with another family our year old is generally quiet and pretty well behaved we do allow him to scream and wail in public but it understandable that he gets annoyed with being in high chair for more than 30 40 minutes he gets vocal but we do let it escalate the other family however had kids all of whom were very shrieky and loud it obvious the parents were tired and just wanted to have meal as family they just let them do what they want because when the parents tried to discipline the kids the kids made it point to shriek louder and make huge scene felt bad for those parents get that they kind of given up it sucks raising kids is easy was bit peeved that they did try harder but can see why they just gave up after while people around the room were pointing and making faces at this family and could help but have mixed feelings yes discipline is hard and sometimes embarrassing but it has to be done on the other hand the mom looked like she had slept in years and the dad was just trying to hold it together being parent is exhausting kids are kids sometimes they cry sometimes they re happy we re all babies and little kids at some point more people need to maintain that perspective hate it so much flight attendant and think it just silly if you can handle hearing noise then take your private jet or drive we shouldn apologize for our kids existing will always have your back if your kids are being crazy on my flight haha give chocolates to the flight crew ve had friends work the gig and know they often skip meals and have to bring their own snacks they re so appreciative and do it even if didn have kid but it doesn hurt to have them know us as that nice family who gave us chocolate have kids one was good baby the other well at some point heard someone say that all babies are good babies they are good at doing what babies do sometimes that means they eat and sleep and poop sometimes that means they cry so yeah have two kids who were good babies completely agree ve never been bothered and hardly notice when babies cry on flights babies are kind of new here and it not their fault excessive perfume use loud talking or loud music from headphones *are* within individual control and are much more aggravating personally always bring foam earplugs an eye mask and travel pillow on every flight bring book to read and if want to watch movie or listen to music bring headphones wether 1h or 12h like to prepare for my own comfort—especially on flight don see why others wouldn do the same if they are so sensitive did the childfree crew come after you removed said the same thing few weeks back on one of those pictures of parent handing out goody bags to passengers said that would never do that as parent ll just entertain my child instead and she will just be another passenger got downvoted and someone said that would have to make goody bags if my kid sucks hmm okay nope pay for my child seat and it the same exact price as mine not apologizing that decided to pay and take my child on flight preach it had to fly times with my daughter in her first year ve read the posts and comments from the childfree crew and the cutesy posts about parents going above and beyond to cater to strangers comforts all do is lol and hope that have the pleasure of inducing tantrum on the internet one day by having the audacity to exist in the world with my baby how many flight attendants are usually working on flight we are flying with our three kids and they would love to give some candy to them they love the flight attendants this always very firm with my sil and my sisters when they apologize for their babies and curious toddlers motherhood and parenting is hard enough with adding the stress of feeling guilty or embarrassed when babies and toddlers are just being exactly what they are meant to be no one will ever have to apologize to me for baby crying or curious little kid asking me million questions or anything like that they need to communicate and even if that just to let everyone know they feel fussy or ask what the picture of tree on my wall means kiddo was good baby on flights because she comfort nurse it super awkward when at the end of your flight you re suddenly surrounded by 8+ people who are congratulating you on your quiet baby because you know in just moment she going to realize the plane has stopped people are looking at her and will violently delatch and scream while you spray boob juice if you lap carry when it happens you could have dual tantrum between the childfree folks and the carseats for the littles folks you are grossly inconvenient *and* going to greviously injure your child yeah some kids cry are the worst cries ve heard but more concerned about what is wrong with the child than the actual crying at times do get annoyed who doesnt but that does mean the parents are bad most of the time kids just do know how to handle emotions or *gasp* talk to us like adults 100 this my husband was one of those who believed if you pick her up every time she cries you ll spoil her and had to remind
